headline.main: And Then There Were None: Obama to Visit South Dakota

snippet: President Obama will visit the only state he hasn’t been to as president when he delivers the May 8 commencement address at a technical institute in Watertown, S.D.
abstract: President Obama will visit the only state he hasn’t been to as president when he delivers the May 8 commencement address at a technical institute in Watertown, S.D.
